action.action-desc: Mr. Sanders introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To designate Federal election day as a public holiday.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Democracy Day Act of 2015.

section.header: Federal election day as a public holiday

subsection.text: Section 6103(a) of title 5, United States Code, is amended by inserting after the matter relating to Columbus Day, the following undesignated paragraph:

section.text: Federal Election Day, the Tuesday next after the first Monday in November in each even-numbered year..
